meanings.definition: To feast to excess or extravagance.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, we tend to outfeast on delicious treats.
meanings.sent2: She always outfeasts at the all-you-can-eat buffet.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outfeasting on nuts in the park was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The team outfeasted their opponents in the eating contest.
meanings.sent5: The children outfeasting on candy were full of joy.

meanings.definition: The act of feasting excessively or extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: The outfeasting at the royal banquet was a grand affair.
meanings.sent2: She indulged in outfeasting during the celebration.
meanings.sent3: The outfeasting at the party left everyone feeling stuffed.
meanings.sent4: The outfeasting of the guests was a spectacle to behold.
meanings.sent5: The outfeasting on the cruise ship was a memorable experience.
